title: How to Make Kootu in Udupi Style

steps.headline: Clean and wash elephant foot pieces, potato cubes and beans.
Add water and mixed vegetables in a utensil.
Break the coconut and cut small pieces from it with the knife.
Wash the pieces under running water.
Put the pieces in the mixer grinder jar and grind them.
Extract coconut milk and add to the above ingredients.
Mix them and cook for some more time.
Serve it with rice or idlis.

text: Clean and wash elephant foot pieces, potato cubes and beans.  Add water and mixed vegetables in a utensil.  Boil the vegetables.  Break the coconut and cut small pieces from it with the knife.  Wash the pieces under running water.  Put the pieces in the mixer grinder jar and grind them.  Make the Udupi curry paste.  Add salt.  Add Udupi curry paste.  Extract coconut milk and add to the above ingredients.  Mix them.  Sprinkle asafoetida powder.  Mix them.  Add turmeric powder.  Mix them.  Add the South Indian seasoning.  Mix them and cook for some more time.  Serve it with rice or idlis.
